title: i lost my hextech chest and key
body: i was opening a hextech chest and when i clicked to open it, it just went black then i restarted my client and i didnt get anything from it and i lost my hextech chest and key

replies.body: When I've seen reports like this, it usually turns out that a summoner icon was unlocked but missed.  I took a look into this for you, and I see that you unlocked Super Galaxy Shyvana icon, nice!  It added 150 Orange essences to your loot as well.  Let me know if that clears things up!
